cast.name: 苏拉克夏·潘塔 Surakshya Panta

director.name: 狄潘德拉·K·卡纳尔 Dipendra K. Khanal

introduction: A man named Dhanapati,from a working class who wants his daughter to get the highest education that is available from Nepal,while being married he decides to sell the stuff he has to pay fees for his daughters school.Long time suffering from high poverty he loses all the hopes than he goes to his best friend to ask him for a job,his friend fulls Dhanapati towards the political game while being on the party he does stuff where no one would do after successfully finishing a rally after that he realizes that it just a money game.
